name: AddisGamer
bio: Pro gamer specializing in RPGs and competitive Shooters. High engagement with the 18-34 Addis Ababa demographic.

name: BettyLife
bio: Lifestyle blogger and daily vlogger. Focused on beauty, fashion, and urban living in Ethiopia.

name: TechWithMiki
bio: Tech reviewer and software engineer. Deep dives into gadgets, apps, and the Ethiopian tech ecosystem.

name: TravelEthiopia
bio: Exploring the hidden gems of Ethiopia. High-quality travel vlogs and photography.

name: FinTechDaily
bio: Daily updates on banking, payments, and financial literacy. Trusted source for business news.

name: FamilyFun
bio: Family-oriented content creator. Focused on parenting, children's activities, and weekend getaways.
